statements: SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Market_Analysis WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Market_Analysis GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Market_Analysis WHERE date_updated = '2021-07-20';
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY date_updated DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Market_Analysis WHERE quantity >= 100 AND category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Market_Analysis WHERE category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories') AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis WHERE date_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, date_updated FROM Market_Analysis WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_trends WHERE market_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM farming_products WHERE product_category='Fruits' ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM farming_products WHERE product_price < 50;
SELECT product_name, price, market_location FROM market_trends WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM market_trends WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM farming_products WHERE product_category = 'Organic' ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, market_location FROM market_trends WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM farming_products GROUP BY product_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT product_name, price, purchase_date FROM market_trends WHERE market_location = 'New York' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_analysis;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_quantity, total_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_analysis WHERE market_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_analysis;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, total_amount FROM market_analysis JOIN sales_data ON market_analysis.product_id = sales_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM market_analysis WHERE market_price > 100.00 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_name FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends WHERE market_price > 100;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM farm_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT category_name FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, market_price, sale_date FROM market_trends WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_locations WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT category_name, description FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, market_price, sale_date FROM market_trends WHERE market_price > 100 ORDER BY market_price DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT location_name, address, city, country FROM farm_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'fruits';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT market_name, location FROM markets WHERE market_name LIKE '%Farmers%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Vegetables';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM farmers WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT market_name, location FROM markets ORDER BY market_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, market_name FROM products JOIN market_prices ON products.product_id = market_prices.product_id WHERE products.price > market_prices.price;
